short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes layout of LinkedIn Messaging to Full Screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you find yourself often reading and writing LinkedIn messages on a large screen (laptop/desktop), you might find this extension useful. It makes your LinkedIn Messaging go Full Screen so you have more space to read and write.
